it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class TurretBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Block
      • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.TurretBlock

  • public class TurretBlock
extends Block
    This class represents all blocks of turret type, which are the blocks that refer to the bonus deck when a grab action occurs

      • TurretBlock

        public TurretBlock(int row,
                   int column,
                   BorderType borderNorth,
                   BorderType borderEast,
                   BorderType borderSouth,
                   BorderType borderWest)
        Class constructor given the position in the board and every BoarderType
        Parameters:
        row - an int representing the row of the block in the board
        column - an int representing the column of the block in the board
        borderNorth - BorderType of the northern border
        borderEast - BorderType of the eastern border
        borderSouth - BorderType of the southern border
        borderWest - BorderType of the western border
